content:
DebugConvert Class

Definition

Converts data from one type to another. Includes methods that convert values to String objects so that they can be displayed by the debugger.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("432D76CE-8C9E-4eed-ADDD-91737F27A8CB")]
public class DebugConvert : Microsoft.JScript.IDebugConvert, Microsoft.JScript.IDebugConvert2
Inheritance
System.Object
DebugConvert

Inherited Members

Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Constructors

DebugConvert()

Initializes a new instance of the DebugConvert class.

public DebugConvert ();

Methods

BooleanToString(Boolean)

Converts the specified Boolean value to a String.

public string BooleanToString (bool value);
value
Boolean

The value to convert.

Returns
String

The literal string "true" or the literal string "false".

ByteToString(Byte,Int32)

Converts the specified Byte value to a String.

public string ByteToString (byte value, int radix);
value
Byte

The value to convert.

radix
Int32

The base of the return value. The base must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

Returns
String

The string representation of value in base radix.

DecimalToString(Decimal)

Converts the specified Decimal value to a String.

public string DecimalToString (decimal value);
value
Decimal

The value to convert.

Returns
String

The string representation of value.

DoubleToDateString(Double)

Creates a string representation of the specified Double. The string representation contains the day of the week, the month, the date, the time, the time zone, and the year.

public string DoubleToDateString (double value);
value
Double

The value to convert.

Returns
String

The string representation of value.

DoubleToString(Double)

Converts the specified Double value to a String.

public string DoubleToString (double value);
value
Double

The value to convert.

Returns
String

The string representation of value.

GetErrorMessageForHR(Int32,IJSVsaEngine)

Gets an error message that is created from the specified stem.Exception.HResult* and the CultureInfo of the specified IJSVsaEngine.

public string GetErrorMessageForHR (int hr, Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaEngine engine);
hr
Int32

The HRESULT error code.

engine
IJSVsaEngine

A reference to the scripting engine.

Returns
String

A localized string that contains information about the error.

GetManagedCharObject(UInt16)

Creates a managed object that has the specified primitive Char value.

public object GetManagedCharObject (ushort i);
i
UInt16

The value to convert.

Returns
System.Object

i converted to a Char and then an Object.

Creates a managed object that has the specified primitive Int64 value.

Int64

Creates a managed object that has the specified primitive value.

value
System.Object

The value to convert.

Returns
System.Object

value converted to a managed Object.

Creates a managed object that has the specified primitive UInt64 value.

UInt64

The value to convert.

Returns
System.Object

i converted to an Object.

RegexpToString(String,Boolean,Boolean,Boolean)

Converts the specified regular expression information to a String.

public string RegexpToString (string source, bool ignoreCase, bool global, bool multiline);
source
String

The regular expression pattern to match.

ignoreCase
Boolean

true to use case-insensitive matching; otherwise, false.

global
Boolean

true to use a global match; otherwise, false.

multiline
Boolean

true to use a multiline match; otherwise, false.

Returns
String

The string representation of the regular expression information.

Converts the specified String to a String that contains escape characters for non-printable characters.

String

The value to convert.

Returns
String

The string representation of source that contains escape characters.

ToPrimitive(Object,TypeCode,Boolean)

Converts the specified value to the specified TypeCode, optionally allowing data loss.

public object ToPrimitive (object value, TypeCode typeCode, bool truncationPermitted);
value
System.Object

The value to convert to a new type.

typeCode
TypeCode

The type to convert value to.

truncationPermitted
Boolean

true to allow data loss; otherwise, false.

Returns
System.Object

value converted to the typeCode type.
